ygData.subject: Re: Meldrath
ygData.msgSnippet: ... new ... According to the various ranger forums about the quest for the icy etched tunic requires the Skull of Meldrath , and as this quest is new, he wont
ygData.messageBody:
> Also, of a side note, Meldrath will be holding one of the components for the
new
> ranger only armor thats coming in with the next patch :)
> So, if he does indeed carry tinkering recipes, it should soon become apparent,
> as all those rangers go gunning for him :)

According to the various ranger forums about the quest for the icy etched tunic
requires the "Skull of Meldrath", and as this quest is new, he wont have dropped
it prior to the patch hitting the live servers.. But now that he does its simply
a matter of hanging out in Steamfont and watching the mid-high level rangers
swarm him. Shouldn't take long to prove or disprove the theory that he has the
book, though its doubtful, unless the original poster (again, I was only
relaying the message) was from the test server.
